description.message: Lets you increment or decrement digits in a URL

popupIncrementImage.description: Title (tool tip) for the increment button image when hovered.

popupDecrementImage.description: Title (tool tip) for the decrement button image when hovered.

popupClearImage.description: Title (tool tip) for the clear button image when hovered.

popupSetupImage.description: Title (tool tip) for the setup button image when hovered.

popupURLLegend.message: Select the part of the URL to increment

popupSelectionLabel.description: Form label for Selection input text.

popupIncrementLabel.description: Form label for Increment input number.

popupZerosLabel.description: Form label for Zeros input checkbox.

popupSelectionNaNError.description: Form error message if user selects a part of the URL that is not a number.

popupSelectionBlankError.description: Form error message if user does not select a part of the URL.

popupSelectionNotInURLError.message: Selection must be a part of the URL.
popupSelectionNotInURLError.description: Form error message if user is somehow able to select something that isn't part of the URL.

popupIncrementNaNError.description: Form error message if user tries to enter non-digits for Increment.

popupIncrementBlankError.description: Form error message if user does not enter a number for Increment.

popupIncrementZeroError.description: Form error message if user tries to enter zero for Increment.

optionsSidebarTitle.description: Options title in the left sidebar.

optionsKeyHeader.description: Shortcut Keys header in the form.

optionsKeyLabel.description: Label for Shortcut Keys checkbox to enable or disable them.

optionsKeyP.message: Click on the text boxes and then press the key you want to assign as a shortcut.  If you would like, you can also hold down Alt, Ctrl, Shift, or Meta (any combination of the four) and press another key to make a key combination shortcut.  "Fast" shortcuts allow you to increment or decrement instantly without having to enter Setup.

optionsMouseHeader.description: Shortcut Mouse Buttons header in the form.

optionsMouseLabel.description: Label for Shortcut Mouse Buttons checkbox to enable or disable them.

optionsMouseFastLabel.description: Fast Shortcut Mouse Buttons checkbox label.

optionsMouseP.message: Select a mouse button to associate it with a shortcut.  If the "Right" mouse button is being mapped to any shortcut, your Chrome context menu will be momentarily disabled only if urli is active on the page.  "Fast" shortcuts allow you to increment or decrement instantly without having to enter Setup.

optionsMouseNoneLabel.description: Mouse (None) Button label (no mouse button to be selected).

optionsAdvancedHeader.description: Advanced Options header in the form.

optionsAdvancedLabel.description: Label for Advanced Options checkbox to show or hide the options for it.

optionsDefaultP.message: You can have urli choose these values by default each time you enter Setup or when you use "Fast" functionality.

optionsSelectionAlgorithmP.message: Help urli correctly guess what part of the URL you want to increment.  You can do this by specifying the best selection algorithm for urli to use.

optionsSelectionAlgorithmCommonPrefixesP.message:
First prioritize finding common prefixes in the URL that usually come before digits.
Currently supported prefixes:"page=", "=", and "/"
(Recommended.)

optionsSelectionAlgorithmLastNumberP.message:
Ignores common prefixes.
Always tries to select the last number in the URL, no matter what it is.
(Use this if Common Prefixes usually guesses the wrong number.)

optionsSaveSuccess.description: Overlay message that appears after pressing Save successfully.

optionsResetSuccess.description: Overlay message that appears after pressing Reset successfully.

optionsKeyError.message: Cannot assign multiple shortcuts to the same key.
optionsKeyError.description: Overlay error message that appears after pressing Save with multiple shortcuts assigned to the same key.

optionsMouseError.message: Cannot assign multiple shortcuts to the same mouse button.
optionsMouseError.description: Overlay error message that appears after pressing Save with multiple shortcuts assigned to the same mouse button.
